p: Catalase activity (CAT, EC 1.11.1.6) was measured according to Jiang and Zhang [ 44], following the consumption of H 2O 2 at 240 nm, for 3 min. Results were expressed as CAT units per milligram of protein. One unit of enzyme decomposes 1 μmol of H 2O 2 per min (coefficient of extinction 39.4 mM cm −1).
